#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<vector>
#include<memory.h>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
#include<cassert>
using namespace std;

int n, ans;
float res;
void solve()
{
scanf("%d", &n);
assert(0<n);

res = (log((float)n)/log(2));
ans = res;
ans = (1<<ans);
ans = 2*(n- ans)+1;
printf("%d\n", ans);
}

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif

    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while(t--)
    {
        solve();
    }
}
